SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
 
AppConstants
This class defines various constants used throughout the application to represent different states and directions of edges.
Args
The Args class provides a collection of static methods for checking method parameters and throwing IllegalArgumentExceptions if the parameters do not meet the specified requirements.
ConnectionDTO
The ConnectionDTO class represents a data transfer object for a connection in a graph.
Digraph<V,E>
A directed graph (or digraph) is a graph that is made up of a set of vertices connected by edges, where the edges have a direction associated with them.
DigraphEdgeList<V,E>
Implementation of a digraph that adheres to the Digraph interface.
Edge<E,V>
An edge connects two Vertex of type V and stores an element of type E.
EdgeDTO
The EdgeDTO class represents a data transfer object for an edge in a graph.
Example
 
ForceDirectedLayoutStrategy<V>
A representation of a force directed layout "strategy" used during automatic layout of nodes in a SmartGraphPanel.
ForceDirectedSpringGravityLayoutStrategy<V>
An implementation of a spring system layout strategy with gravity towards the center.
ForceDirectedSpringSystemLayoutStrategy<V>
An implementation of a spring system layout strategy.
Graph<V,E>
A graph is made up of a set of vertices connected by edges, where the edges have no direction associated with them, i.e., they establish a two-way connection.
GraphDTO
GraphDTO represents a directed or undirected graph consisting of nodes and edges.
GraphEdgeList<V,E>
ADT Graph implementation that stores a collection of edges (and vertices) and where each edge contains the references for the vertices it connects.
InvalidEdgeException
Thrown when using an invalid edge in calls of methods in Graph and Digraph implementations.
InvalidVertexException
Thrown when using an invalid vertex in calls of methods in Graph and Digraph implementations.
Main
 
NodeDTO
Represents a node in the graph with a unique label.
PathGraph<V,E>
The PathGraph class represents a graphical panel that extends Pane and manages the logic for handling a graph's display and interaction.
PathGraphUI<V,E>
The PathGraphUI class extends PathGraph to provide a user interface layer on top of the graph management functionalities.
ShapeCircle
This class represents a circle shape with a specified radius.
ShapeFactory
A factory class for creating instances of shapes with a specified center coordinates and radius.
ShapeRegularPolygon
This class represents a regular polygon shape with a specified number of sides and radius.
ShapeStar
This class represents a five-point star shape inscribed within a specified radius.
ShapeWithRadius<T>
This interface represents a shape with a radius, providing methods to access and modify properties related to the center coordinates and radius of the shape.
SmartArrow
A shape of an arrow to be attached to a SmartArrow.
SmartCircularSortedPlacementStrategy
Places vertices around a circle, ordered by the underlying vertices element.toString() value.
SmartGraphEdge<E,V>
A graph edge visually connects two Vertex of type V.
SmartGraphEdgeBase<E,V>
A base interface for boost smart graph edges that visually connects two vertices and supports additional features.
SmartGraphEdgeCurve<E,V>
Concrete implementation of a curved edge.
SmartGraphEdgeLine<E,V>
Implementation of a straight line edge.
SmartGraphPanel<V,E>
JavaFX Pane that is capable of plotting a Graph or Digraph.
SmartGraphPanel.Tuple<T>
Represents a tuple in Java.
SmartGraphProperties
Properties used by SmartGraphPanel.
SmartGraphVertex<V>
Abstracts the internal representation and behavior of a visualized graph vertex.
SmartGraphVertexNode<T>
Internal implementation of a graph vertex for the SmartGraphPanel class.
SmartGraphVertexNode.PointVector
 
SmartLabel
A label contains text and can be attached to any SmartLabelledNode.
SmartLabelledNode
A node to which a SmartLabel can be attached.
SmartLabelProvider<T>
A provider interface for generating labels.
SmartLabelSource
Method annotation to override an element's label provider.
SmartPlacementStrategy
Contains the method that should be implemented when creating new vertex placement strategies.
SmartRadiusProvider<T>
A provider interface for generating radii values.
SmartRadiusSource
Method annotation to override an element's vertex shape radius.
SmartShapeTypeProvider<T>
A provider interface for generating shape types.
SmartShapeTypeSource
Method annotation to override an element's vertex shape type representation.
SmartStylableNode
A stylable node can have its css properties changed at runtime.
SmartStyleProxy
This class acts as a proxy for styling of nodes.
SvgConstants
This class contains static variable to simplify the access of icons.
UtilitiesBindings
Some Math operations implemented as bindings.
UtilitiesCapture
Utility class for capturing images from a JavaFX Pane and saving them as PNG files.
UtilitiesPoint2D
Class with utility methods for Point2D instances.
UtilitiesUI
Utility class for creating various JavaFX UI components such as buttons, labels, text fields, and forms.
Vertex<V>
A vertex contains an element of type V and is used both in graphs and digraphs.
